DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether daily executive training cognitive inhibition , work memory mindfulness compare active control condition near- far-transfer impact brain behavioral measure collect child age 9-10 year , either born preterm full-term .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria child : Male female Aged 910 year inclusion French school curriculum ( since 1st grade ) Fully inform dedicate booklet Both parent give write consent Normal medical , neurological brain image assessment Inclusion criterion non preterm child : Full term pregnancy abnormal event ( > = 37 week amenorrhea ) Inclusion criterion preterm child : Delivery 33 week amenorrhea Exclusion Criteria participant : Age 910 year old inclusion Monozygotic twin Restrictions Magnetic Resonance brain image exam : claustrophobia , metallic element ( cardiac implant , cochlear implant , metallic element brain eye close nervous system , metallic prothesis , brace ) , restless participant . Sudden cognitive impairment due stroke , head injury associate loss consciousness one hour encephalitis . Chronic neurological , psychiatric , infectious liver condition , endocrine disruption . Past current medical condition : cancer , diabetes , chronic lung condition , cardiac , metabolic , hematological , endocrine immunological disorder . Medication assume interfere brain imaging measure ( psychotropics , hypnotic , anxiolytic , neuroleptic , benzodiazepine , steroidal antiinflammatory , antiepileptic , painkiller , muscle relaxant ) . Leftsided handedness Colour blindness noncorrected visual disturbance Diagnosed developmental disorder Diagnosed cerebral palsy Diagnosed Fine motor disturbance Parents affiliate Social Security Parents able join time study
